name: liquidate
attributes: # [doc = " レンタル期間超過時に担保を没収・清算するが、"]
# [doc = " rental_account.renter と ctx.accounts.user.key() の一致検証がない"]
body: let rental = & mut ctx . accounts . rental_account ;

let cpi_accounts = Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . escrow_nft . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . treasury_nft . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . service_authority . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts) ;
* * ctx . accounts . deposit_pool . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () -= deposit ;
* * ctx . accounts . treasury_account . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () += deposit ;

fields.name: rental_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = renter)] を指定して借り手照合を行うべき"]

fields.name: escrow_nft
fields.attribute: # [doc = " EscrowでロックされたNFTのトークンアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: treasury_nft
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 運営側のNFT受取用トークンアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: deposit_pool
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 保証金を保管するプールアカウント（Lamports保管先）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: treasury_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 清算後の保証金受取先運営口座"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: service_authority
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CPI実行用サービス権限アカウント"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来この契約を所有するべき貸し手のPubkey"]

fields.name: renter
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来この契約を実行した借り手のPubkey"]

fields.name: deposit_amount
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 保証金として預け入れられたLamports量"]

fields.name: rental_count
fields.attribute: # [doc = " これまでのレンタル回数"]
